alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Crowley County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued January 07 at 10:20AM MST until January 08 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...North winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts of 60 to 70 mph possible. * WHERE...Southern El Paso, Pueblo, Crowley, and Otero Counties. * WHEN...From late tonight through Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Brief periods of snow are possible Monday morning and while amounts are expected to be light, blowing snow will be possible at times.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
